Text:
Is this just the expansion or a standalone game, and if so, does this include all previous DLC?

and of course, Thanks.
This is a standalone game, new campaign.
Oh nice, no need for base game, thanks, love Magicka's gameplay+humor.
Hey, how do I change my players name, I go to install dir and change Azaq in the playername.txt and still cant change it.

Sorry, I figured it out, In-game you have to press ESC when selecting the character and click (Create new)
